title: Kristen Stewart goes hell in black leather biker jacket with white trousers while out in New York
text:
She is known as one of the most stylish women in showbiz.

And Kristen Stewart looked chic as always on her latest outing.

The 29-year-old actress went hell for leather in a black biker jacket while on a solo outing in New York City on Tuesday evening.

Under the outerwear she donned a grey shirt and white trousers rolled up to just above the calf.

Out and about: Kristen Stewart went hell for leather in a black biker jacket while on a solo outing in New York City on Tuesday evening

She completed the retro-chic look with a pair of black and white wingtip shoes with long socks.

Kristen accessorized with several chain necklaces including padlock pendants and several rings on her fingers.

Her highlighted tresses were worn in an elegantly disheveled updo as her make-up was complete with smokey eye.

Stunning: Kristen accessorized with several chain necklaces including padlock pendants and several rings on her fingers

Kristen has been dating Dylan Meyer in recent months as they were first seen together in August.

The Twilight actress and the screenwriter were last seen heading to a karate class in Los Angeles last Friday.

Kristen and Dylan's romance came quickly after Stewart rekindled her romance with Stella Maxwell over the summer.

On-off: Stewart and ex Stella Maxwell were seen hooking up in June after an eight-month split, but things seemed to fizzle again after. The couple are seen in June 2017 above

Stewart and the 29-year-old Lions Model were seen hooking up in June after an eight-month split, but things seemed to fizzle again after.

The sapphic couple were first pictured partying together at the Met Gala way back in May 2016.

During her off-time with Stella, Stewart briefly dated stylist Sara Dinkin.
description: The 29-year-old actress went hell for leather in a black biker jacket while on a solo outing in New York City on Tuesday evening.
